item.title: The Top New Gadgets We Saw at IFA Berlin 2025
item.description: A tennis-playing robot, a projector in a party speaker, and a whole bunch of new AI-powered wearables. Here are some of the best gadgets we saw at IFA...

item.title: Tesla Proposes a Trillion-Dollar Bet That It's More Than Just Cars
item.description: Tesla’s board wants to give Elon Musk an unprecedented $1 trillion pay package. To get all the money, he has to make robots and robotaxis work.

item.title: Defense Department Scrambles to Pretend It’s Called the War Department
item.description: President Donald Trump said the so-called Department of War branding is to counter the “woke” Department of Defense name.

item.title: Anthropic Agrees to Pay Authors at Least $1.5 Billion in AI Copyright Settlement
item.description: Anthropic will pay at least $3,000 for each copyrighted work that it pirated. The company downloaded unauthorized copies of books in early efforts to ...

item.title: Top Spec Razer Blade Laptops Are Average 14 Percent Off Right Now
item.description: This slim gaming laptop is one of our favorites, with an impressive design and the power to match.
